snippet: The commission said that TRUSTe deceived consumers about its recertification program and allowed itself to be falsely portrayed as a nonprofit corporation.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission penalizes TRUSTe, saying firm deceived consumers about its website privacy recertification program and allowed itself to be falsely portrayed as a nonprofit corporation.
lead_paragraph: The commission said that TRUSTe deceived consumers about its recertification program and allowed itself to be falsely portrayed as a nonprofit corporation.

headline.main: F.T.C. Penalizes TRUSTe, a Web Privacy Certification Company
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Penalizes a Web Privacy Certification Company
